document_data.name: Tower of Harmony
document_data.mainbody: The '''Tower of Harmony''' was located atop [[Mount Kus]] in the [[Hordelands]] near [[Kushk]].
document_data.Description: The Tower was constructed on the site where the six roads leading up from the [[Holy Mountain of Kus]] converged. Each road actually led to a different floor of the Tower. Though it was a simple structure made from red stone, the Tower of Harmony was considered to be a place of perfect enlightenment.
document_data.Inhabitants: The High Lama of [[Bimasara]] lived within the Tower of Harmony. He met with priests who were wise enough to master the dangerous tests within the Holy Mountain below.
